dict.acceptation: 他/她/它们；人们，大家；政府，当局；她们；

sent.orig: The verb should be in the plural,e.g."have" in "they have".
sent.trans: 这个动词应用复数形式，如they have中的have。
（或They themselves did it。）这是他们亲自干的。

sent.orig: They're so lacking in confidence in the attraction of the games they televise that they feel they have to hype up with some hysterical commentator in order to get anyone to watch them.
sent.trans: 他们对于用电视播映比赛的吸引力太缺乏信心，以至于他们感到必须要用一个说得天花乱坠的讲解员来做实况广播，以便招揽观众。

sent.orig: Eggs are cheap when they are plentiful and they are dear when they are scare.
sent.trans: 鸡蛋多了就便宜，少了就贵。

sent.orig: If they had [had they] time, they would certainly come and help us.
sent.trans: 如果他们有时间，他们一定会来帮助我们。
